customer_name: State University of New York College at Oneonta

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The IACUC conducted a program review as well as a facility inspection in November 2023, however the report of the
evaluation did not contain the required information. The IACUC report must be signed by a majority of IACUC members
and must contain any minority views. In addition, the report must be submitted to the Institutional official. The IACUC must
prepare reports of its conducted evaluations as required by the AWA and the reports must be available to APHIS officials
upon request.
**********Correct by May 1, 2024 or by the next IACUC semiannual review
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The IACUC conducted a program review as well as a facility inspection in November 2023, however the report of the 
evaluation did not contain the required information. The IACUC report must be signed by a majority of IACUC members 
and must contain any minority views. In addition, the report must be submitted to the Institutional official. The IACUC must 
prepare reports of its conducted evaluations as required by the AWA and the reports must be available to APHIS officials 
upon request. 
**********Correct by May 1, 2024 or by the next IACUC semiannual review 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
